page.title: 07A Boy's Day
page.content: Most Saturdays,because it isn't school,I get up about 8.30/9,00a.m. and watch television in my pyjamas.I go up with my Mum into Easingwold. Later I have decided to go fishing so I get some maggots.I have my lunch then go round to my Gran's to fish.It is an old brick pond which has been mostly filled in and restocked with fish. I catch mostly perch,sometimes 3 or 4.I have caught as many as 12.I usually have a pack-up for my tea. When I get back,if Dad has any jobs I can help him with,I do.Then I have a swing in the dutch barn and watch television for the rest of the night.
